description: This seminar covers varying topics in American history, depending upon the instructor. Recent topics have included "Lincoln and his America," "The American Revolution," and "19th-Century American Political Culture." May be repeated if topic is different. Offered most years. Counts toward American studies major.
name: Sem: Civil War/Emancipation
notes: Especially for rising junior and senior history and American studies majors, others need permission of instructor.
title: American Seminar
